image-reference.author: Kieran O'Donnell
image-reference.title: Typical universal beam to column connection detail

image.alt: Typical universal beam to column connection detail

ol.li: 8 mm steel plates to be welded to the top and bottom of the column using 5 mm fillet welds.
Plate width must be the greater of the column width or the beam width.
Plate length must be such that there is not less than 40 mm from the centreline of the bolts to the ends.
All bolting between structural steel members must be not less than 2 M12 4.6/S.
